DETAIL - Proof Roll - Site Engineer and Engineers Rep to undertake a Proof Roll test on the trimmed subgrade. 1 pass minimum per lane
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Over whole area requiring construction
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA - Check for consistency. Areas with excessive flex to carry out additional scala testing.

DETAIL - Scala Testing/Plateau Testing - Scala testing to 10m centres staggered. If Proof Roll Fails undertake additional Scala testing to 2m centres staggered in the area. If Scalas not sufficient, Plateau Testing to be carried out to prove compaction requirements
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Scala worksheet, Plateau Testing
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA - Scala results recorded, Plateau Testing sheet
DETAIL - Undercut - Pending results from proof roll and Scala, undercut areas to be marked out, excavated and constructed
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Scala worksheet, inferred CBR
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA - Asbuilt & Survey to pick up undercut area.
FREQUENCY - 1 per 50m2 staggered (min 5 tests per lot)
INSPECTION / TEST METHOD - Visual Inspection, NDM Lab Testing
CONFORMANCE CRITERIA - Compaction of material is being followed within the guidelines set in the specifications. Avg. >= 95% MDD and Min. >= 92% MDD
